task: Explore the "ModelFieldEditor" page to customize card fields for a personalized AnkiDroid experience.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu successfully accesses the ModelFieldEditor page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "Toggle navigation"

By touching the "Toggle navigation" button, the screen now displays additional options for logging in and signing up, along with a focused button for toggling navigation. The layout has been updated to provide more interactive elements for the user.
Touch on a button that has text "Log In"

By touching the "Log In" button, the screen transitioned from the previous SharedDecks page displaying various deck information to the current Login page where users can input their email and password for logging in.
Touch on a button that has text "Apps"

By touching the "Apps" button, the screen has transitioned to the "SharedDecks" page, where new options such as "Home," "Docs," and "Download" are now visible, offering additional functionalities to explore.
Touch on a button that has text "Docs"
By touching the "Docs" button, it became focused on the current screen, indicating that it is the currently selected option in the navigation.

The actions taken so far have not directly led fufu to the ModelFieldEditor page for customizing card fields. fufu needs to explore the "Deck options" or "Settings" to find the path leading to the ModelFieldEditor page.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "主页"

By touching the button with the content description "主页," the screen transitioned from the "SharedDecks" page to the "SharedDecks" page with additional popup messages appearing briefly and disappearing.
Touch on a button that has text "Apps"

By touching the "Apps" button, the screen has transitioned to a new page within the app, displaying information about Anki and its features, along with options for downloading and learning more about the program.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "牌组搜索"
